DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Study localities list. Table S1
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Location, defaunation status and mean (±SD) diameter (mm) of Euterpe edulis (Arecaceae) seeds sampled in the Atlantic forest in Brazil. N, sample size. Marked with * are sites where focal observations were conducted.
